entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High 11. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers late this evening and after midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing rain after midnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
